secondaries.missionName: Sow the Seed, Reap The Fear
secondaries.shortDescription: Score points when an enemy unit fails a Morale Test, Falls back, fails an action or if you melee kill enemy units

subObjectives.description: An enemy unit fails a Morale test.
An enemy unit fails an action.

each time an enemy unit is destroyed by a melee attack made by a NIGHT LORDS model from your army, before removing the last model in that enemy unit from the battlefield, roll 2D6: score if the result equals or exceeds the Leadership characteristic of that enemy model
